get.summary: Returns a listing of groups the current user is a member of (empty list when unauthenticated)
The description (metadata) of a single component or profile item

401.description: Item requires authorisation and user is not authenticated

403.description: Non-public item is not owned by current user and user is no administrator

get.summary: Returns information about the rights to an item for the current user
Returns a listing of groups to which an item belongs

post.summary: Transfers an item to the specified group (either from the private space or another group)

403.description: Current user has no access

get.summary: Information on the current authentication state. Pass 'redirect' query parameter to make this method redirect to the URI specified as its value.

200.description: If no query parameters are passed, with the authentications status in its body

303.description: A redirect to the URI provided as the value of the 'redirect' parameter

post.summary: Triggers the service to require the client to authenticate by means of the configured authentication mechanism. Notice that this might require user interaction!

303.description: A redirect, either to a Shibboleth authentication page/discovery service or other identification mechanism, and ultimately to the same URI as requested (which should be picked up as a GET)

401.description: If unauthenticated, a request to authenticate may be returned (not in case of Shibboleth authentication)
